description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.com

Praveena Fernandes - Software Engineer at Neo4j

ABSTRACT
In this talk I will share my top lessons - these include both successes and failures - which were often difficult to digest. Most importantly, I will share the successes that at the time, looked like failures. [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/cph-2016/presentations/show_talk.jsp?oid=7774

https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference

title: GOTO 2016 • Microservices: A Utopian Mystery • Praveena Fernandes
